title: eSim on Pixel 3XL
content:
Good day. I own the Google Pixel 3XL. When I try to connect the eSim profile, I get an error connecting the eSim profile. Operator Tinkoff Mobile and TELE2.
При автоматической активации через приложение выступает такая ошибка.

When you enter the code to activate eSim, an endless download begins when checking the network data.

With automatic activation through the application, such an error appears.



With the mobile operator TELE2 the same situation. Both operators said that the problem is in the smartphone and I need to contact the manufacturer. OS Version: Android 11
